ModMetaData.name: Mlies Misc Modifications
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Various modifications I like when I play, aimed for making the game a little more realistic.
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/MliesMiscModifications
Modifications:
VanillaFences and ArchitectExpanded-Fences - Chainlink fence now requires Machining instead of smithing
TemperatureGauge - Both TemperatureGauges requires Basic Electronics
